name: Selena's Essential Eye Duo Eyeshadow Stick & Mascara Set
about: What it is: Selena’s latest faves for creating a classic smokey eye, with a full-size eyeshadow stick in a limited-edition bronze olive shade, and a mini mascara..Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. These products are also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: The All of the Above Weightless Eyeshadow Stick in Perspective will line, shade, and smoke out eyes all in one. The Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara finishes the look for lush, long, lifted lashes, no matter your lash type...This Set Contains:.- 0.04 oz/ 1.3 g All of the Above Weightless Eyeshadow Stick in Perspective(deep golden olive).- 0.27 oz/ 8 mL Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara (Black)
ingredients: Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara: .-Castor Oil: Conditions, softens, and nourishes lashes...Water/Aqua/Eau, Copernicia Cerifera (Carnauba) Wax/Copernicia Cerifera Cera/Cire de carnauba, Glyceryl Stearate, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Stearyl Esters, Synthe􀆟c Wax, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Wax/Helianthus Annuus Seed Cera, Stearic Acid, Palmi􀆟c Acid, Butylene Glycol, Polyacrylate-21, Olea Europaea (Olive) Oil Unsaponifiables, Aminomethyl Propanol, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Synthe􀆟c Beeswax, Rhus Verniciflua Peel Wax/Rhus Verniciflua Peel Cera, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Galactoarabinan, Rhus Succedanea Fruit Wax/Rhus Succedanea Fruit Cera, Shorea Robusta Resin, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Xanthan Gum, Trideceth-6 Phosphate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipropylene Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Disodium Phosphate, Polysorbate 60, Sodium Phosphate, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Ultramarines (CI 77007)...All Of The Above Weightless Eyeshadow Stick in Perspective: .Trisiloxane, Dimethicone, Synthe􀆟c Fluorphlogopite, Octyldodecanol, Phenylisopropyl Dimethicone, Synthe􀆟c Wax, Microcrystalline Wax (Cera Microcristallina/Cire microcristalline), Silica, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891).
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.All of the Above Weightless Eyeshadow Stick: .-To use as eyeshadow, twist up to reveal product, then swipe across lids and blend with fingertips or brush, repeating as desired..-To use as eyeliner, simply glide tip directly along your lash line..-To sharpen, pop out the built-in sharpener from the bottom and twist it over the pencil to  .reshape the tip...Perfect Strokes Universal Volumizing Mascara Mini: .-Starting at the base of the lashes, pull mascara brush through from root to tip. .-Layer until desired effect is achieved. .-Repeat on bottom lashes..-If you typically use an eyelash curler before application, feel free to curl your lashes beforehand..-To remove mascara, use eye-makeup remover or wash off with a gentle cleanser and warm water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great value - love the shadow stick buy I  tend to wear crayons as a smudgy liner. This color is a neutral for me and very pretty on. Mascara is nice - good way to try the product
